tiled.io
Class ImageHelper

java.lang.Object
  tiled.io.ImageHelper

public class ImageHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides functions to help out with saving/loading images.

Version:
$Id$

imageToPNG

public static byte[] imageToPNG(java.awt.Image image)
Converts an image to a PNG stored in a byte array.

Parameters:
image -
Returns:
a byte array with the PNG data

bytesToImage

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage bytesToImage(byte[] imageData)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
Converts a byte array into an image. The byte array must include the image header, so that a decision about format can be made.

Parameters:
imageData - The byte array of the data to convert.
Returns:
Image The image instance created from the byte array
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
Toolkit.createImage(byte[] imagedata)

loadImageFile

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImageFile(java.io.File file)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
This function loads the image denoted by file. This supports PNG, GIF, JPG, and BMP (in 1.5).

Parameters:
file -
Returns:
the (partially) loaded image
Throws:
java.io.IOException
